name: Eurocamara de Comercio de la Republica Dominicana
legal: Camara de Comercio, sin fines de lucro
goal: Stimulate trade between Dominican Republic and Europe, Promote and defend interests of European businesses and investors, support the development of the DR.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Culture, Energy, International co-operation and development, Trade
euInitiatives: As the european chamber of commerce in the Dominican Republic we are independant from the EU. We collaborate and allign our plans and activities with the EU Delegation in the Dominican Republic, and focus on stimulating trade and on the use of the EPA agreement between the EU and CARIFORUM. Further we advice around issues related to non-tariff based trade barriers.
